en: Please state your opinion with relation to this project.
zh: 请陈述你对这个项目的看法。

en: I want you to search high and low for a writer who's just right for this project. Leave no stone unturned.
zh: 我希望你竭尽全力寻找一个最适合这个项目的作家。不要遗漏任何线索。

en: This project admits of improvement.
zh: 这个项目还有改进的余地。

en: What does this rock look like?
zh: 这块石头看起来像什么？

en: This rock has the shape of an animal.
zh: 这块石头的形状像一个动物。

en: These toys are suitable for girls.
zh: 这些玩具适合女孩玩。

en: These pills act on the heart.
zh: 这些药丸作用于心脏。

en: It is the behavior of the control group that is important in this connection.
zh: 在这种情况下，重要的是对照组的行为。

en: Let us consider in this connection the influence of Western ideologies on Korean literature.
zh: 在这种情况下，让我们考虑一下西方意识形态对韩国文学的影响。

en: Sending manuscript after manuscript paid off. A magazine finally published my work.
zh: 不断地投稿终于有了回报。一家杂志最终发表了我的作品。

en: This is a good report, except for this mistake.
zh: 这是一份很好的报告，除了这个错误。

en: Except for this mistake, this is a good report.
zh: 除了这个错误，这是一份很好的报告。

en: In order to fix this mistake we'll have to tear out this seam.
zh: 为了改正这个错误，我们必须拆开这条缝。

en: This mistake is due to his carelessness.
zh: 这个错误是由于他的粗心造成的。

en: I am to blame for this mistake.
zh: 这个错误是我的责任。

en: I was at a musical recently, in the third row. Seeing the actor I love up close like that made me feel more smitten with him than ever.
zh: 我最近去看了一场音乐剧，在第三排。近距离看到我喜欢的演员让我比以往任何时候都更迷恋他。

en: The other day he bought a wallet made of kangaroo leather for me.
zh: 前几天他给我买了一个袋鼠皮的钱包。

en: Thanks very much for having me to dinner the other night.
zh: 非常感谢你前几天请我吃饭。

en: In the last typhoon, the wind blew at over 200 kilometers per hour!
zh: 上次台风中，风速超过了每小时200公里！

en: Can you account for your absence last Friday?
zh: 你能解释一下你上周五的缺席吗？

en: You said so the other day, didn't you?
zh: 你前几天是这么说的，不是吗？

en: We watched a TV program the other day about your people.
zh: 前几天我们看了一个关于你们民族的电视节目。

en: I went to the dentist recently and he did a cast of my teeth and took an X-ray, 'just in case.' It sounds like a good business to be in.
zh: 我最近去看牙医，他做了我的牙齿模型并拍了X光片，'以防万一'。听起来这行生意不错。

en: I got your fax the other day.
zh: 前几天我收到了你的传真。

en: The other day I noticed I was driving around with the parking brake on. It's a wonder the car could even move.
zh: 前几天我注意到我开着车，手刹还拉着。真奇怪车还能动。

en: From this point of view we should say he was right.
zh: 从这个角度来看，我们应该说他是对的。

en: What does this kanji mean?
zh: 这个汉字是什么意思？

en: If you continue to take this herbal medicine, it will do you good.
zh: 如果你继续服用这种草药，它会对你有好处。

en: This custom should be done away with.
zh: 这种习俗应该废除。

en: This tradition is followed in most households.
zh: 这个传统在大多数家庭中都遵循。

en: This practice has long since been done away with.
zh: 这种做法早已被废除了。

en: These patients have trouble walking.
zh: 这些病人行走困难。

en: It will be a long time before this patient gets well again.
zh: 这位病人要过很久才能康复。

en: This generous offer may be a mere pose.
zh: 这个慷慨的提议可能只是装装样子。

en: I can't put up with this cold.
zh: 我受不了这寒冷。

en: The cold was the worst in fifty years.
zh: 这次寒潮是五十年来最严重的。

en: I can't stand this cold.
zh: 我受不了这寒冷。

en: I can no longer stand the cold.
zh: 我再也受不了这寒冷了。

en: You must not leave her waiting outside in such cold weather.
zh: 你不能让她在这么冷的天气里在外面等。

en: Give me a hand with this bag.
zh: 帮我拿一下这个包。

en: This bag was carried by car.
zh: 这个包是用汽车运来的。

en: This bag looks as tough as the one you have.
zh: 这个包看起来和你那个一样结实。

en: This amount includes tax.
zh: 这个金额包括税。

en: This frame shows the painting to good advantage.
zh: 这个画框能很好地衬托这幅画。

en: This theory consists of three parts.
zh: 这个理论由三个部分组成。

en: Going to this school requires a lot of money.
zh: 上这所学校需要很多钱。

en: There are more girls than boys in this school.
zh: 这所学校女生比男生多。

en: This school has no heating.
zh: 这所学校没有暖气。

en: This school is ours.
zh: 这所学校是我们的。

en: Discipline is rather mild at this school.
zh: 这所学校的纪律比较宽松。

en: This school has many students.
zh: 这所学校有很多学生。

en: This school supplies students with textbooks.
zh: 这所学校为学生提供课本。

en: The standards for admission to this school are very high.
zh: 这所学校的入学标准非常高。

en: The students of this school are kind.
zh: 这所学校的学生很友善。

en: Any student of this school must learn one more foreign language besides English.
zh: 这所学校的任何学生除了英语外，还必须学习一门外语。

en: Let me tell you about the origin of this school.
zh: 我来告诉你这所学校的由来。

en: Only 16 percent of the teachers of this school are female.
zh: 这所学校只有百分之十六的教师是女性。

en: The curriculum of this school is wide and shallow.
zh: 这所学校的课程设置范围广但深度不够。

en: Two-thirds of the students of this school are boys.
zh: 这所学校三分之二的学生是男生。

en: This school has several foreigners on the roll.
zh: 这所学校有几名外籍学生。

en: There are forty-one teachers and about eight hundred students in this school.
zh: 这所学校有四十一位老师和大约八百名学生。

en: Talented students come from far and wide to attend this school.
zh: 有才华的学生从四面八方赶来就读这所学校。

en: There used to be a bake-shop on this corner.
zh: 这个角落以前有一家面包店。

en: No country under the sun is safe in this nuclear age.
zh: 在这个核时代，世界上没有哪个国家是安全的。

en: What has brought you to this city?
zh: 是什么把你带到这座城市来的？

en: This town has undergone a rapid change.
zh: 这个城镇经历了快速的变化。

en: It's been ten years since I came to this town.
zh: 我来这个镇已经十年了。

en: Please drop in to see us any time you're in town.
zh: 你什么时候来镇上，请随时来拜访我们。

en: I tried to find out how many people really live in this town.
zh: 我试图弄清楚到底有多少人住在这个镇上。

en: Go up these stairs.
zh: 走上这些楼梯。

en: These cough lozenges taste bitter but they will do you much good.
zh: 这些止咳含片味道很苦，但对你很有好处。

en: This picture is of my uncle.
zh: 这张照片是我的叔叔。

en: This drawing dates back to the fifteenth century.
zh: 这幅画可以追溯到十五世纪。

en: This painting is attributed to Picasso.
zh: 这幅画被认为是毕加索的作品。

en: Put these pictures up us for wall, please.
zh: 请把这些照片挂在墙上。

en: It is me that painted this picture.
zh: 这幅画是我画的。

en: When I painted this picture, I was 23 years old.
zh: 我画这幅画的时候，我23岁。
